name: Escape To Daylight
description:
Escape To Daylight

Escape to daylight is a 2d find the exit in the dark platformer. A horrifying compilation of much greater minds thrown together in a way Dr Frankenstein would take notes on. The aim is simple. Dodge the distractions. Except many imperfections and bugs as you find your way back to the light.

Controls: 

W/A/S/D Or the arrows for movement, Left Shift increases speed, V Key to dash

There are 66 coins to collect. Never made it into the build

Any input would be greatly appreciated Good, Bad or Harsh I don't mind.
